SEARCH
Package gw.datatype

Interface IPresentableDataType

public interface IPresentableDataType
Represents the presentation aspects of a datatype.

For the methods that take a context object of type Object and a property IPropertyInfo, these arguments represent contextual information that may influence the datatype's response. These arguments may always be null. It is the implementation's responsibility to deal with null for these arguments.

Author:
pdalbora

  • Method Details

    • getInputMask

      String getInputMask(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the input mask associated with this datatype. The input mask is a string containing any number of characters, with one character identified as the replacement character. Returns null if this datatype has no input mask.

    • getRegexPattern

      String getRegexPattern(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the regex pattern associated with this datatype. Returns null if this datatype has no regex.

    • getPlaceholderChar

      String getPlaceholderChar(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the placeholder character associated with this datatype. The placeholder character is used in conjunction with input masks to parse values entered by the user. Returns null if this datatype has no placeholder character.

    • getDisplayFormat

      String getDisplayFormat(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the display format associated with this this datatype. Returns null if this datatype has no display format.

    • getGosuPresentationHandler

      IPresentationHandler getGosuPresentationHandler(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)

    • getPresentationType

      PresentationType getPresentationType(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)

    • getCalendar

      DisplayCalendar getCalendar(Object ctx, IPropertyInfo property)
      Gets the calendar to use when rendering values of this datatype. Returns null if this datatype does not specify a calendar.
